title: contact us - need to speak with a PERSON
content:
My disabled son has worked part time for the past 12 months. He saved everything he earned to buy this phone. Sadly, he only had it a week and it was accidentally damaged and no longer works. 
I am looking for a compassionate fix/replacement. 
He is a great kid who needs a break.
If anyone can help, please let me know.
Thank-you 

Peter
